unnormalised: In yesterday's Pro Kabaddi League match, the Bengaluru Bulls defeated the Patna Pirates with a final score of 45-38. Pawan Kumar Sehrawat of the Bulls secured 15 raid points, while Sachin Tanwar of the Pirates managed 12. The match, held at the Kanteerava Indoor Stadium, saw a total of 83 points scored.
normalised: In yesterday's Pro Kabaddi League match, the Bengaluru Bulls defeated the Patna Pirates with a final score of forty five to thirty eight. Pawan Kumar Sehrawat of the Bulls secured fifteen raid points, while Sachin Tanwar of the Pirates managed twelve. The match, held at the Kanteerava Indoor Stadium, saw a total of eighty three points scored.

unnormalised: The Indian cricket team concluded its tour of Australia with a 2-1 series victory. In the final test match at the Gabba, Brisbane, India chased down a target of 328 runs on the 5th day. Rishabh Pant scored an unbeaten 89, earning him the Man of the Match award. The series win marked India's second consecutive test series victory on Australian soil.
normalised: The Indian cricket team concluded its tour of Australia with a two to one series victory. In the final test match at the Gabba, Brisbane, India chased down a target of three hundred and twenty eight runs on the fifth day. Rishabh Pant scored an unbeaten eighty nine, earning him the Man of the Match award. The series win marked India's second consecutive test series victory on Australian soil.

unnormalised: In badminton, PV Sindhu reached the semi-finals of the All England Open, before losing to Akane Yamaguchi. Sindhu’s quarterfinal match against Tai Tzu Ying ended with a score of 21-17, 13-21, 21-19. The tournament prize money pool was $1.1 million USD.
normalised: In badminton, P-V Sindhu reached the semi-finals of the All England Open, before losing to Akane Yamaguchi. Sindhu’s quarterfinal match against Tai Tzu Ying ended with a score of twenty one to seventeen, thirteen to twenty one, twenty one to nineteen. The tournament prize money pool was one point one million U-S-D.

unnormalised: The Indian men's hockey team secured a gold medal at the Asian Games, defeating Pakistan 3-2 in the final. Harmanpreet Singh scored 2 goals for India, with the winning goal coming in the final minute. The victory ensured India’s qualification for the upcoming Olympic Games.
normalised: The Indian men's hockey team secured a gold medal at the Asian Games, defeating Pakistan three to two in the final. Harmanpreet Singh scored two goals for India, with the winning goal coming in the final minute. The victory ensured India’s qualification for the upcoming Olympic Games.

unnormalised: The FIFA World Cup final saw Argentina defeat France 4-2 on penalties after a 3-3 draw. Lionel Messi scored 2 goals in the match and was awarded the Golden Ball. Kylian Mbappé scored a hat-trick for France, securing the Golden Boot with 8 goals. The match was watched by an estimated global audience of 1.5 billion viewers.
normalised: The F-I-F-A World Cup final saw Argentina defeat France four to two on penalties after a three to three draw. Lionel Messi scored two goals in the match and was awarded the Golden Ball. Kylian Mbappé scored a hat-trick for France, securing the Golden Boot with eight goals. The match was watched by an estimated global audience of one point five billion viewers.
